name: Dillon Amphitheater Concerts 2025
description: Confirmed concerts at Dillon Amphitheater in Dillon, Colorado, for 2025

events.name: St. Paul and The Broken Bones & The Wood Brothers
events.description: An evening of soulful rock and Americana with St. Paul and The Broken Bones and The Wood Brothers.

events.name: Alison Krauss & Union Station featuring Jerry Douglas
events.description: Bluegrass legends Alison Krauss & Union Station return to the stage with special guest Jerry Douglas.

events.name: Tash Sultana
events.description: Multi-instrumentalist Tash Sultana brings their 'Return To The Roots USA Tour' to Dillon.

events.name: Drive-By Truckers & Deer Tick
events.description: Kick off the summer with a free Mountain Music Monday concert featuring Drive-By Truckers and Deer Tick.

events.name: Modest Mouse
events.description: Indie rock pioneers Modest Mouse perform live at Dillon Amphitheater.

events.name: Dirty Heads
events.description: Reggae-rock band Dirty Heads bring their high-energy performance to Dillon.

events.name: Eggy
events.description: Free Mountain Music Monday concert featuring jam band Eggy.

events.name: Colorado Jazz Repertory Orchestra
events.description: Special free holiday concert by the Colorado Jazz Repertory Orchestra.

events.name: Yesterday - The Beatles Tribute
events.description: Experience the magic of The Beatles with tribute band Yesterday.

events.name: National Repertory Orchestra
events.description: Free Mountain Music Monday concert featuring the National Repertory Orchestra.

events.name: The Motet
events.description: Funk band The Motet returns to Dillon for a night of danceable grooves.

events.name: Lotus
events.description: Free Mountain Music Monday concert featuring electronic jam band Lotus.

events.name: The Nacho Men
events.description: Free Mountain Music Monday concert with retro party band The Nacho Men.

events.name: Cake
events.description: Alternative rock band Cake performs live at Dillon Amphitheater.

events.name: Dogs in a Pile
events.description: Free Mountain Music Monday concert featuring jam band Dogs in a Pile.

events.name: Shadowgrass
events.description: Free Mountain Music Monday concert with bluegrass band Shadowgrass.

events.name: DISPATCH with John Butler
events.description: DISPATCH and John Butler perform with special guests Donovan Frankenreiter and Illiterate Light.

events.name: The Australian Pink Floyd Show
events.description: Celebrate the 50th anniversary of 'Wish You Were Here' with The Australian Pink Floyd Show.

events.name: Alysha Brilla
events.description: Free Mountain Music Monday concert featuring singer-songwriter Alysha Brilla.

events.name: My Morning Jacket
events.description: Rock band My Morning Jacket performs live at Dillon Amphitheater.

events.name: Billy Currington & Eli Young Band
events.description: Country artists Billy Currington, Eli Young Band, and Just Jayne take the stage.

events.name: Keller Williams
events.description: Free Mountain Music Monday concert featuring multi-instrumentalist Keller Williams.

events.name: Greensky Bluegrass
events.description: Progressive bluegrass band Greensky Bluegrass performs at Dillon Amphitheater.

events.name: Dillon Music Festival
events.description: Free Mountain Music Monday featuring local artists at the Dillon Music Festival.
